attributes.action: Ask supermarkets to stock affordable low carb products for diabetics
attributes.background: I was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes last year. I struggle to find food products that are affordable and easily accessible in supermarkets. I would like to ask the government for help and support to get supermarkets to stock low carb products to make it easier to live with and manage diabetes

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is the responsibility of supermarkets, not the UK Government or Parliament.
